title: brainless
author: brainless
content: lets play new ideadec 1 (1)pubkey 0279be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798dec -1 (FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFEBAAEDCE6AF48A03BBFD25E8CD0364140)pubkey 0379be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798both pubkey half0200000000000000000000003b78ce563f89a0ed9414f5aa28ad0d96d6795f9c630300000000000000000000003b78ce563f89a0ed9414f5aa28ad0d96d6795f9c63both pubkey half02a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3c03a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3cboth pubkey half0216f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf22470216f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf2247now Questionexample when pubkey 02 is odd, 03 same x will be evenand last you see both same pubkey return even or odd, but one direction only....but alternate if you 0216f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf2247 * 2result 02a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3c03a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3c div 2result 0216f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf2247 so finally we learn, 02/03 same x have odd and even , they is no option 2 different pubkeys direction have 1 return pointshare your knowledge ....

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: You just multiplied and divided the same values which will always return as same, 1 and -1, do you think you could play my game now? What is the smallest public key and largest public key? And could we somehow organize them alpha numerically? That way you'll have a map to the entire public key database and then represent them with decimal even hexadecimal values. Mind blowing I know, maybe your username could be used as a reference to me.ðŸ¤£ Quote from: brainless on February 08, 2023, 07:46:14 PMlets play new ideadec 1 (1)pubkey 0279be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798dec -1 (FFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFEBAAEDCE6AF48A03BBFD25E8CD0364140)pubkey 0379be667ef9dcbbac55a06295ce870b07029bfcdb2dce28d959f2815b16f81798both pubkey half0200000000000000000000003b78ce563f89a0ed9414f5aa28ad0d96d6795f9c630300000000000000000000003b78ce563f89a0ed9414f5aa28ad0d96d6795f9c63both pubkey half02a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3c03a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3cboth pubkey half0216f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf22470216f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf2247now Questionexample when pubkey 02 is odd, 03 same x will be evenand last you see both same pubkey return even or odd, but one direction only....but alternate if you 0216f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf2247 * 2result 02a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3c03a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3c div 2result 0216f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf2247 so finally we learn, 02/03 same x have odd and even , they is no option 2 different pubkeys direction have 1 return pointshare your knowledge ....

comments.body: Quote from: ecdsa123 on February 08, 2023, 09:36:22 PMit is bulshit:)...snip...Are you talking to me or to OP? It is worth mentioning that you can't use tags inside the code tag. e.g. ["b"].Could you also clarify what is BS?

comments.author: COBRAS
comments.body: 02 03 is Y odd even, not X etc etc bull shitsibstract is same as divide, and without float

comments.author: ymgve2
comments.body: ecdsa123's point is you did the math wrong, one will always be 02 and one will always be 03, when you get two equals you messed up the math.

comments.author: brainless
comments.body: tested all version of fastecdsawere doubt if sub bug inside fastecdsa, but all ver says save 0216... 0216...someone have other python or c scripts for div, can test and verifyas i mention math formula for div EC, at decimal result is different

comments.author: hexan123
comments.body: i'm check this dividing with bitaddress.org and always one is even and one is odd uncopressed:1/8 is: 0416F9A89D6DA61F39BDBD7AA1D99D6C4FE7D35C91AE777DF739678098DCDF2247C673D580E0A09 32D00BD9DDE2B44A738A240E3D5386EF35903E7A4E9886D522C-1/8 is: 0416F9A89D6DA61F39BDBD7AA1D99D6C4FE7D35C91AE777DF739678098DCDF2247398C2A7F1F5F6 CD2FF426221D4BB58C75DBF1C2AC7910CA6FC185B157792AA03ps.hi to all i'm new (special regards to COBRAS my english is worst than yours and i'm more would like break bitcoin than you  )

comments.body: Quote from: brainless on February 09, 2023, 06:01:14 PMtested all version of fastecdsawere doubt if sub bug inside fastecdsa, but all ver says save 0216... 0216...someone have other python or c scripts for div, can test and verifyas i mention math formula for div EC, at decimal result is differentI ran test, I get same answer as below using two different programs (other than fastecdsa):Code:ecctools-main>keymath 03a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3c / 2Result: 0316f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf2247ecctools-main>keymath 02a6b594b38fb3e77c6edf78161fade2041f4e09fd8497db776e546c41567feb3c / 2Result: 0216f9a89d6da61f39bdbd7aa1d99d6c4fe7d35c91ae777df739678098dcdf2247
